```{r echo=FALSE}
# Function to get data #
getData <- function(sql, n = -1){
  #setup connection
  res <- dbSendQuery(wrds, sql)
  dbHasCompleted(res)
  
  #perform fetch
  returnData <- fetch(res, n)
  
  #clear memory
  dbClearResult(res)
  return(returnData)
}
```
